features.opening:
******************************************************
* Welcome to the Nutritious Food replacement program *
******************************************************

Search a product in the Open Food Facts database and find a healthy substitute

Instructions - Look up a category, then look up a product
The program will hand you a selection of healthy replacements ! You can save your recommandation and consult more info on it in the Look up saved recommandation section :)
Please make a selection

categories.index: Thanks for waiting, there are {} pages of categories
categories.index_position: You are currently browsing page {} out of {}
categories.index_sorting: Categories are ordered from largest to smallest categories
categories.navigation_instruction:
Enter a number from 1 to 10 to select a category

Enter 'j' to jump to another page of result
Enter 'e' to exit
Enter 'n' to go to the next page
Enter 'p' to go to the previous page
categories.input_error: Please enter a number from 1 to {}, E, J ou N
